Topic.Title: Warren Buffet: cap gain 30%, 50% tax on the rich

Message.Msg: Don't you have a Walmart to picket?

Message.Title: Unions Trying to Start Greece Like Action
Message.Msg: The Hostess Cupcake Union obviously over played their hand. Now, Barry believes it's time to push for Union like benefits for all, (Even for those who refuse to join the Union). Making Walmart pay higher salaries, just to be fair. That is what Obamacare is all about. Giving Union like benefits to the masses. It won't work, those days are gone forever. Only public services Unions are growing.

Message.Title: If Men were Angels, No Gov't Would be Needed
Message.Msg: This quote is from The Federalist Papers. Barry's Obamacare is Controlling my right to get the Healthcare I desire. We should not have 3000 IRS Agents trying to limit how I spend MY Money! Barry is The Dark Angel. We should demand a recount. Election fraud ran rampant in the election.

Message.Msg: Barry, and his Union buddies, believe, now is the time to disrupt our society. This is not Greece. Union membership can not be forced on those unwilling to join.

Message.Msg: Economic Freedom is the basis of Capitalism. People are yearning to be free, not yearning to be FREELOADERS!

Message.Msg: Way, too hard to believe. People are being shot in all neighborhoods now, here in Baltimore. The trendy ones, as well as those deep in the hood. Topic.Title: If Men were Angels, No Gov't Would be Needed

Message.Msg: Who do you think runs the governments of this world? Satan told Christ he did and Christ didn't contradict him. He will continue to run these earthly governments until the Second Advent. That's why government is corrupt and those that run it.

Topic.Title: California Nurses on Strike, cause of Barry

Message.Msg: It really makes me laugh, when I think about how many Dumb Dem policies run counter to each other. For example, Nanny Bloomberg should be delighted that Hostess (twinkes, and ho ho(s), ring dings, ding dongs), will no longer be made. Just think of the heart attacks prevented. However, these makers of dangerous desserts, are Union Members who funnel their dues to the Dem Money laundering machine. On which side should Barry come down on this one? It's easy, he'll just ignore it. Heck, he's taking a victory lap in Asia, on yet another vacation. One thing for sure, this Presidente has campaigning, and the kicking back part of the Presidency down to a science. It's the governing, (aka heavy lifting) part of the job (Middle East Meltdown), that always gets put on the back burner.
